title: 09/09: Week 1 Recap: Trade Conner? Buy Mahomes? Sell A.P.? (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
What a fun way to start out the 2018 season, and of course we must start the show with some James Conner talk (1:56). What is his trade value? What you trade him for Kenyan Drake? We've got Week 1 winners (6:00) like Joe Mixon and Patrick Mahomes and losers (10:30) like Chris Hogan and Deshaun Watson ... Injury news and who to pick up (15:24), Buy or Sell (22:26) with DEN WRs, LeSean McCoy, Matt Breida, Adrian Peterson and more, plus a segment called "Do They Matter" (32:00) about some WRs who are practically unowned and a SEA TE who had more than 100 yards today ... Recapping every game (37:13)! Are we concerned about the HOU offensive line? About Kareem Hunt's role? About Ben Roethlisberger on the road? ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
This episode is sponsored by www.ZipRecruiter.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
